name: Earch
text: Chris, what we're about to discover should never have been revealed to you.

name: Earch
text: So whatever happens, remember one thing

name: Earch
text: What you will see or hear will take you nowhere but deep down.

name: Neant
text: As silence finally settles, your world is turned upside down.

name: Neant
text: Who is this mysterious person who seems eager to talk to you ?

name: Neant
text: Why are they here ? Is there a connection to your presence in this place ? It's a whole new search for you.

name: Neant
text: Perhaps it is the path you've always [color=red]desired[/color].
